name: Alfa Folder Locker
short_description:
'Alfa Folder Locker' is a small free software to lock any folder with password.
The folder will be secured by the password against open, copy, move, and delete.

The locking process is so fast " less that 1 sec " and all data will be secured even if you
check the show hidden files on your system

You can protect any number of folders by different passwords.

Even if you install new windows the folder will still be locked by your password.

The program has integrated context menu, so you can easily lock or unlock any folder by right click it

The program is easy to use and has a friendly user interface.

Operating System Supported : Microsoft Windows ( 98 , xp , 2003 , vista , seven , and windows 8 )

The setup is easy and the program can be used as a standalone by using the application file.
summary: folder secured by password against open, copy, move, and delete.
